title: Buy groceries
content: Buy milk, eggs, and bread from the supermarket after work.

title: Project kickoff
content: Project Alpha kickoff meeting scheduled for Monday 9am with the core team.

title: Doctor appointment
content: Annual physical appointment on Friday 3pm at Midtown Clinic.

title: TypeScript tip
content: Use unknown instead of any to enforce type narrowing in TypeScript.

title: SQL optimization
content: Index the columns used in WHERE and JOIN clauses to speed up queries.

title: AES-GCM
content: AES-256-GCM provides confidentiality and authenticity with a 12-byte nonce.

title: PBKDF2 params
content: PBKDF2 with 310k iterations and SHA-256 is acceptable for cross-platform KDF.

title: Vacation idea
content: Consider visiting Kyoto in spring for cherry blossoms and temples.

title: Workout plan
content: Alternate push and pull days; aim for 3 sessions per week.

title: Keyboard shortcuts
content: In VS Code, use Ctrl+Shift+P to open the command palette.

title: React state
content: Lift state up to the closest common ancestor component to share data.

title: Chunking strategy
content: Use sentence-aware chunking with small overlaps to preserve context.

title: Token estimation
content: Estimate tokens with a heuristic: ~4 chars per token for English.

title: SQLite backup
content: Use VACUUM INTO to export a compact copy of the SQLite database.

title: Daily reflection
content: Write three bullet points about what went well today.
